website_summaries.verdict: This blow-up screen gives you a big viewing space and compacts for easy storage.
pros: Packs away to a manageable size for storage
A great backyard movie night option
cons: The motor fan on this screen has to run continually to keep it inflated
Can blow a bit in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best purchase we have EVER made
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the best purchase we have EVER made. We use it with our RV for outdoor movie viewing. Packs up nicely. The 9ft is huge, maybe the bigger one would be too big. The screen is a smooth nylon, cannot see the wrinkles when playing a movie. This thing comes with ties to keep from swaying but truly the base is such a good design you don’t really need the ties. We love how the screen snaps on and off for storage. Inflated in about a minute or less. Super easy to use and a lot of fun. recommend this to everyone!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lobsterbisque

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is awesome! Easy to set up and take down. The blower is not loud at all. Super satisfied with this screen!!
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It does go up quick and we didnt notice the blower during the movie.has adjustable straps to smooth out the screen and the picture with my projector looks great (even with older movies). Easy to clean. I love that I can remove the screen from the frame to bring inside and use also. Only this I would have done with this whole thing was to make a bigger storage bag. It is tough to fold it up into the small bag. So I just use a bigger bag I already had for storage/travel. I would recommend this screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We love this screen! It is very easy going up and tear down is extremely simple. It clips onto the black inflatable sides easy and we were able to hang the screen in our basement when the inflatable piece is not in use. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: JennH

customer_reviews.title: Set up and easy of use. Super Plus-Plus
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bad ass! Thursday night football was awesome on this outdoor screen. Inflates in minutes. If anything, could use another set of tiedown loops at the top to counter the wind. Easy set up and pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Warming up in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Screen is NOT 17’.  Other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We are thoroughly enjoying outdoor movies! Does everything well. Only complaint is that it is advertised as 17’ screen And when you look close the screen is actually approx 6’ x 13’. 17’ from the ground to the top of the support tube at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I have returned this item.  The fan that is used to keep the screen filled is loud.
customer_reviews.text: I have returned this item. The fan that is used to keep the screen filled runs always and it loud. The screen once filled it must be tethered to something. It’s top heavy and does not stand on its own. It’s also pretty bulky
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen! Perfect for backyard movie nights!
customer_reviews.author: Lackley

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: WE USED THIS MOVIE SCREEN FOR AN OUTDOOR CAMPING BIRTHDAY PARTY. WHEN WE FIRST AIRED IT UP IT SOUNDED PRETTY LOUD. BUT WHEN THE MOVIE WAS PLAYING AND THERE A LOTS OF PEOPLE NO ONE EVEN NOTICES. IT WAS INFLATED AT LEAST 5 HOURS AND NEVER MADE A BOBBLE. OUR GUEST ARE ALREADY ASKING TO BORROW IT FOR THE SUPER BOWL AND NFR THIS WINTER. BIG HIT!! I WOULD BUY THIS AGAIN IN A HEART BEAT! NOT JUST A ONE TIME USE THIS COULD BECOME A REGULAR. THE ONLY CHALLENGE IS TRYING TO PUT IT BACK IN THE SAME BAG IT CAME OUT OF.
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS E TATE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and huge freaking screen. I've used this for an 80 kid event at work and there wasn't a bad seat in the house. It sits high enough kids can run around in front and not block the view. I've also used it in my backyard for movie nights with a couple neighbors. Cant wait to play some video games and for football season to start! Everything fits into a smaller size duffle type bag.
customer_reviews.author: scaryv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Backyard Fight Night
customer_reviews.text: We got this to watch have a fight party in our backyard. Setup was simple and took less than 15 minutes the first time. I took it out of the box, followed the instructions and it was up and ready to show the fight. Picture quality was excellent! Even with street lights shining directly down onto the screen the picture was sharp and crisp. Our next event is a movie night with the neighbors! One thing to watch out for is the fact that this thing will NEVER fit into the bag that came with it. My recommendation is to go to Target or Lowes and get a medium-sized tote to store in and you are all set!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Knight

customer_reviews.title: Awesome movie screen at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: First screen came with the fan and that was it. Waited a week for the replacement. I was very impressed with this screen. The bag is useless as you will never get it all in and be able to close. The screen itself folds up to keep it clean. Blows up in minutes with ease. You do have to stake this dude down. Kids and neighbors loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S Roach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summertime backyard movie night!!
customer_reviews.text: Last year I thought about getting one of these for my kids. I thought it would be awesome to watch some movies this summer in the backyard. I had forgotten about it over the winter, until this spring where I saw a local news station covering a movie fest utilizing one of these. I knew I had to get one for my kids, so here we are. It's been awesome, they love it every time I bring it out (every weekend since purchase). Even the neighbors get to watch and enjoy a movie night !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely amazed at how great this screen is. You plug it in and it inflates within minutes. Tip, plug it in to inflate halfway and then clip in the screen. I love that the screen clips in and is not velcro. Very sturdy and comes with ties down as well. The quality is great and the size is perfect for an outdoor screening, which is what we wanted. LOVE! Can't recommend it enough. So many people have asked about it and are shocked when I tell them how much I've spent.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Large
customer_reviews.text: The over all size is amazing, The carry bag seems a little small and flimsy for this size of package (I'll get a larger duffel bag) the fan system is quiet not much noise at all. The screen inflates rapid and full. Tie downs will need to be used with this size if there is much of a breeze. Very suitable for no wind to light breeze. This screen will not only be used at home for back yard movie nights but also on my lecture rounds at schools and public parks. This is a good product
customer_reviews.author: David J. White

customer_reviews.title: Pure garbage
customer_reviews.text: Pure garbage.... order this in May but just attempted to put it up. Won’t event stand up with a slight wind. Do not buy this.... I wish I could return it but window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: charles smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the best....but not the worst....
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay screen. We are keeping this one as a back-up to our better quality screen. The set-up is easy....the sound of the fan is definitely noticeable during a movie....but the white plastic screen is REALLY cheaply made. We use a HD projector & the screen absorbs a good amount of the picture so you definitely do NOT get HD quality. Like I stated....it’s not the worst blowup projector screen....but it most certainly isn’t the best.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Terrific for entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic purchase! I bought the 14 ft screen for a graduation party and family entertainment. We LOVE it. The quality is outstanding, the ease of getting it up is amazing. Taking it down was also easy and we had no problem getting it back in the little bag. Tip: When setting up make sure the zipper near the blower is completely zipped or you’ll think it’s not inflating. Tip 2: Inflate the black frame and then lay it on its back. Then clip the screen on. Then just stand it back up and then stake it down. Totally love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: teridene

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Very big screen. Much bigger and you may need a fancy projector with enough light output and prevent pixelization and/or higher Hz to keep up on action screens without it blurring. Overall very pleased. I've used it inside and out. The fan is a little loud inside, but you can just turn up the speakers a little (note, have 10' ceilings as it will touch it). The bag they give you is a small and like most things that come in bags can be difficult to get it to fit back in. Screen detaches from the frame so you can store is separately or in a bag to prevent it from getting dirty. Overall satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Fan motor does not keep screen inflated.
customer_reviews.text: the fan motor is not strong enough to fully inflate the screen. even using the staking strings we could not get the screen to stay upright. very disappointing. going to try and use the white screen part with some pvc to create a screen - but I would NOT recommend this solution to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MTippets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an outdoor movie or sports
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to watch the CFB playoffs outside in style. It was easy to setup and take down. I did it by myself in 15 minutes and I'm not exactly a home improvement guru. Blower noise was noticeable but not overly distracting once your projector starts. Screen looked great and appears relatively easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: It’s Huge! (17’)
customer_reviews.text: I initially was going to buy the 15’ screen but the 17’ screen was on sale and would ship faster so I went ahead purchased it instead. I set it up in my house and boy is it huge! It was incredibly easy to attach the viewing screen and it inflated in seconds. The motor wasn’t distractingly loud but you can hear it. I figure once it’s set up outside with a good sound system I’ll forget all about the noise. Take down was fast however good luck putting it back in the box. All in all good product. Can’t wait to have a movie night outside. I’m sure my neighbors will enjoy it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen. Goes up quickly. Easy to take down.
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen easy to assemble. Wrinkles are ocassionally visible depending on the picture. Most can be removed by increasing the tension on the screen but I have not been able to remove them all. I thought about trying to roll the screen tightly on a rod or something to minimize wrinkling during storage but havent tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: dakota seal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! It was very easy to setup and took only minutes to do so. We purchased for my son's 16th B-day. He and his friends camped in our backyard, watching movies and playing video games all night! They thought it was very "cool". A great way to bring family and friends together!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the party
customer_reviews.text: I bought this screen and only used it once so far. It is really awesome!!!! Every one that came over for outdoor movie night was saying how great and quiet it was. The screen was thick enough that very little light went through the back which means the picture was that much brighter. Look forward to many more outdoor movies.
customer_reviews.author: Mom D.

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Good, but wish the air blower was more like an air mattress and less like a jump house....it makes it very noisy and difficult for the little ones to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This screen a big! The instructions were simple and easy to follow. The fan is not loud. Once you get the movie going and you sit from afar or close -it tunes out. It comes with the bag-although it’s a little hard to fold and put away(due to it being so big) if you’re deciding on wether getting an inflatable one or flat screen. Go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we need.
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. Perfect for our family movie nights! It's very simple to put up and get going. The blower is quiet which we love. The only thing we find to be a pain is the actual screen that clips on to the blow up frame wrinkles really easy. You can use a handheld steamer or maybe a blowdryer to get the creases out. That way they dont show up while your watching your movie. Other than that it comes with a nice bag for storage and the stakes you need to secure it. Overall a great unit. Pretty heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: SammieRae

customer_reviews.title: Great size & picture, but wish it was more stable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use at a birthday party. It was windy the day I put it up, and I could not get it to stay upright no matter how I adjusted the ropes and stakes. I ended up putting it directly in front of my house so that it would not blow over, and it worked pretty well. It still swayed back and forth, but did not blow completely over after putting something behind it. I think it would work great if there were NO wind. I wish it was more stable. The size was perfect, and the picture displayed wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Air Blower
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this product, I read over the reviews. One common concern that kept arising was the noise from the air blower. Some felt that the noise level was distracting from the movie. My experience, my family and friend experience, NO WAY! Granted, we had an external speaker and were sitting approximately 20 ft away from the blower but at no time was it too loud. I now wonder how close were these people to the blower while they were watching this 17x12 foot screen. My opinion, buy this product. One of our friends was so impressed, he purchased his during the movie. Now, if I can only find a blower that I can use overseas. Any suggestions? Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Johnson

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE ! The company stood by the defective product. Waiting for my refund to change rating.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted three times then motor died.First summer was ok used it 3 times.. . I had 20 people at my house this season and it bombed the night. There is a fuse in the plug. it was fine but clanged it with the extra. No luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Semahde

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles in the screen
customer_reviews.text: It is quick and easy to set up. I was pretty excited to set it up the first time. Picture quality is ok. It says it’s not supposed to show wrinkles bc they used a special material for the screen. But you can still see them.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Product was perfect but the blow up piece broke first week of use.....
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Second Summer and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: We use this for backyard movie night. 9 families on the block went in on buying this. It is large enough for a big backyard. This is just the screen. You will need speakers and the projector and computer. Held up to windy conditions but we do stake it down. Let it dry before putting it back in the bag so it does not get moldy. A single person can bring down the screen. I used my own tent stakes as the stakes that comes with it are flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: bjs

customer_reviews.title: So glad we bought this
customer_reviews.text: We have had a projector for years, but we bought the screen at the end of last summer, so we didn't use it much. Since this pandemic has started though it has proven to be worth it's weight in gold ❤️❤️ So glad we finally decided to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Huge screen with amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny!!! The kids and I love watching movies on this. I have a 4k projector and always get compliments when we use it. The ONLY complaints I have are the buckles are somewhat brittle, several of them have broken or cracked. However, the company sent me out a new screen the same day I emailed. The screen comes folded up and is permanently creased in some spots, it's hardly noticeable though. It's still a 5 star product! Have recommended to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: MattP1

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Blows up fast and is large. Wish I would have gotten the bigger one. Well, because why not? the smaller one is still huge and won't fit anywhere in a normal house, and some garages due to height. So why not go bigger?! Everything was well made. Screen, because it is made to be portable, does leave a lot of creases. However, when viewing straight on they are not really noticeable. I also have a 2500 lumen projector. Cheapo $100 one. It is plenty bright, but not go with anything less. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful size and set up
customer_reviews.text: Set up and down in a flash. Convenient carry bag. I wish it came with little flags for the tie downs so no one trips on them at night. We tied little pieces of fabric so the kids wouldn't trip n fall. Overall no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fast and easy set up take down
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! Worth every penny!! Super easy to put up and down. I agree the bag that comes with it is ok for the black part but if you dont want your screen to be wrinkled you wont be putting it in there. But it goes up fast maybey 2 minutes. Thr screen snaps on very easy and is easily adjusted. You seriously cant beat the price for this. Hige hit every time i use it!! Definitely would recommend and in fact i have freinds and family who purchased it after me. Do it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kikisma

customer_reviews.title: Simple Set and Great Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: We love this screen, been a big hit with the neighborhood kids since our theaters are over an hour away and with covid. Its so easy our tweens set it up and pack it back in the bag with ease!
customer_reviews.author: MShytle

customer_reviews.title: I would like to buy extra parts for this.  Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than I thought. This thing is awesome!! I would like to order just the clips where the screen clips to the frame part if I can. I would love to hang this in my man cave wall when I'm not using it. I'm willing to pay decent money for them I'd you guys will sell me just that part extra
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Russelburg

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, paired it with DracoLight 3300 lumens mini projector makes for fun family nights!
customer_reviews.text: We love our outdoor movie nights! I spent several days reading reviews of this and similar screens and am glad we decided on this one. Easy to put up (make sure large zipper near blower is closed😊) less than five minutes and take down as well. We use two medium-sized storage boxes for it, the blower, projector and small sound system. Makes for fun neighborhood block parties!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your anchor are there
customer_reviews.text: Didnt get a chance to use my screen this past weekend for my reunion . because there where no anchors in my box. Can't wait to get to enjoy with family
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: Received the screen on time, was a lot bigger than I expected. Used it for the first time last night and absolutely LOVE it. Highly recommend this product. Super excited to watch football games this weekend! Super easy to put up, easy to put away!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Can't withstand the slightest breeze
customer_reviews.text: This was just ok. I returned it and just purchased a regular cloth screen. This item can't stay a small breeze, it will bend back and forth, even with all tie downs. The black material is VERY thin. It was easy to setup. The fan wasn't loud. It was just too bendy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Morton

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: I got mine in December and just used it. My friends and family love it. We use it every weekend. Its big I mean really big and the fan is hardly noticeable. We connected our fire tv stick to the projector and connected the fire tv stick sound to our portable jbl speaker/ All together we spent about $550 on the projector, the screen, fire tv stick and the jbl speaker and its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Good concept. could use some design improvments
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good product. The screen shows a very good picture. it blows up easily. However, keeping it up is a bit of an issue. it appears the air compressor doesn't pressurize the support system enough which at times leads the screen to bend where the tie-down ropes are connected. Also, it would be nice if you could blow it up and plug the air, so the air compressor doesn't run. When it stays up and sound is loud enough, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: anthony correia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use it to show free movies in the park for our small community. We have shown 6 movies! Our town has been torn apart by drugs, and we wanted to try to bring something that could help impact the community for the better. We show mainly Christian based films, and hand out free popcorn! So far it’s been a well used purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and works great!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and only takes a couple minutes. First time to set up took three people. Now, if need be I can do it solo - but more fun with two. Screen has folds on it but you don’t notice it AT ALL once it gets dark. You also do not notice sound of fan that keeps it inflated It is a little challenging getting it rolled up and into bag they provide for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Budney

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this based on it's cheesy looking thumbnail and some negative reviews. That said, I was pleasantly surprised setting it up and using it for a party. It feels well built and does the job well. One thing I wasn't expecting was the need to keep the inflation fan running the whole time you're using the screen, but the fan isn't that loud so it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Fehnel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the backyard
customer_reviews.text: Great for backyard events. It’s tall and light so make sure you use the stakes even if a little breezy. I don’t recommend if it’s windy though. This thing is huge and can easily fly away if you don’t install and tie down properly.
customer_reviews.author: alMember

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Works great for watching movies at the pool. Easy install and take down... Also great for camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This screen is just what we were looking for. It blows up in less than a minute, the screen is perfect because it just clips on and off. The wrinkles are not visible on the movie either. I saw some reviews about the fan being loud but we dont think so at all. We used this screen in our game room so a bit enclosed and with the movie on we couldn't hear the blower on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eldaliz Lara

customer_reviews.title: Will not work if ANY breeze.
customer_reviews.text: This is a junk screen, if there is any breeze at all it will fold in half. I used the tie down ropes that came with it. They didn’t help. The rings for the ropes are only half way up the outside support so the top will just fold over. The fan doesn’t seem to be strong enough. I am returning it for something a little better designed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money!!
customer_reviews.text: The setup is not easy. The rope and stakes they give you don't fit well together. The slightest breeze knocks this thing over. I was excited to get it but one of the worst decisions I've made. So infuriating
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect for our neighborhood party! Super easy to set up and take down--less than 5 min each for 1 person! Picture quality is great and since we had it on concrete we didn't even need to use the ground spikes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kujav98

customer_reviews.title: great product well made
customer_reviews.text: we love this and its so entertaining for my grand-kids, we set it up on Halloween with a few different movies and when Casper was on the little trick o treat wouldn't leave and wanted to sit and watch the movie. parents thought it was a great idea for kids. I highly recommend this to all
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer 😎

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Motor is nice and quiet. One buckle broke already. Hard to keep screen smooth, gets wrinkly however stored.
customer_reviews.author: bobbijokay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen and compact while stored
customer_reviews.text: Holy HUGE screen. We got the 17’ inflatable for our outside deck to watch movies at night while we float in the pool. Usually Jaws or something similar. It is fantastic but caught us off guard with the overall size. Very durable, comes with rope and stakes to keep secure but wouldn’t recommend to use if wind is above 12-15 MPH.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Works great and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for outdoor parties by the pool. Very satisfied with it. We use an HD Projector and portable sound system with it and playing video games on a 12ft screen outside in full HD is beyond amazing. Plus we can all lay in pool or on deck and watch movies. Definately recommend.... The fan isnt very loud and you cant hear it when watching tv anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Larry N.

customer_reviews.title: Big screen hard to keep upright
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality screen. The frame has a few tears after first use but nothing major. Very easy to install. The biggest problem is keeping the thing upright. It comes with stakes but even the slightest wind blows the 14” screen over. We had to tie it to a tree for movie night after spending an hour trying to adjust the stakes. Might be easier with the smaller screens. In retrospect I would’ve just gotten a smaller one because the actual product is nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Landon B Krantz

customer_reviews.title: Giant screen,  small price
customer_reviews.text: Dear Slim, I wrote you, but you still ain't calling..... I wanted to let you know about this great screen! I wanted to invite you over for backyard movie night or something. Anyway, the screen is great, really easy to setup and use, the motor is quiet so it doesn't interfere with the movie, or game. The kids use it fur gaming as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and easy to set up... HOWEVER the fan is loud, and it’s also small so it doesn’t i flat good. The zipper part that holds the fan kept unzipping which caused the air to be low. It’s ok if u don’t mind getting up every 10 mins to zip the fan compartment. It’s not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Buff Meek

customer_reviews.title: Broken Clips
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with three clips broken on the screen. It does not affect the quality of the picture, but I hate that I paid so much for a damaged product. Overall, it's a great purchase. The motor to inflate is surprisingly very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our get together. Little hard to see in the daylight but fantastic at night. Great price perfect size with great carrying case that is light and portable. Little to no sound from the fan. Loved it and will use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W. Noble

customer_reviews.title: It was Great & easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my daughter's outdoor movie night. It was Great & easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney P.

customer_reviews.title: Order Today it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I have bought. The price is amazing! I will say We could not fit everything into the bag they gave us so we will have to purchase our own. I only used it once so far, but so far so good. My daughter was so excited to swim and watch movies.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this you will be very happy! It's like the Christmas blow up ornaments for the lawn but way stronger! Blower is very quiet and strong, screen looks great love the way it snaps on and then you can take it back off and Fold It Up.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, but advertised size is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, easy to set up. But, be advised, the actual screen area is 10 feet measured diagonally. The advertised "14feet" is misleading. Look closely at their picture with the measurement. It measures from the corner of the entire screen frame at the ground, to the top corner of the substantial frame area, well past the viewable screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Murphy

customer_reviews.title: A Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Father's Day. We love having the family over, kids and grandkids. We watch Disney movies outside following cookouts. It's a great family time!
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: COVID-19 Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: One of the best random Amazon purchases yet! I’ve hosted over a dozen outdoor movies so far this summer and every guest is blown away by this screen. It’s quick to assemble and take down after each use. The reflective screen makes the creases and wrinkles disappear. I’ve also never noticed the sound of the fan being too loud. Overall, it’s an amazing find for the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It’s HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This came used but I set it up any way. The back of the screen was covered in giant boot prints. I started the return but immediately ordered another one and was promised it would be new. This thing is really awesome! Hubby liked it so much he took pics and bragged to his buddies.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Shepard’s planter posts HACK to FIX WINDY NIGHTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was frustrated at first with a windy night and the screen wouldn’t stand up, but it was a quick fix and it extremely sturdy now! I purchased Shepard’s planter posts as someone else suggested and is isn’t moving a bit in extreme wind!
customer_reviews.author: Callimonster

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We love this little screen. We've started having social distancing movie nights. Very easy to set up. I'm sure it won't last a long time but for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Branson

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up!
customer_reviews.text: But you wont get it in the carry bag after your done!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use great price for the size. We love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a month but have used it 6 times. It's a small to set up and ready to take down. It stores without any trouble. The screen allows a bright picture of course that is also depending on your projector. There is a fan attached that keeps the thing up it's not loud but there is a noise. We love it having movie night outside. For Halloween we showed movies on the front lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Drocca

customer_reviews.title: This worked GREAT with our projector that we hooked up to our ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked GREAT with our projector that we hooked up to our Direct TV box. ALL our guest could see the Pay Per View fight with ease. Love it <3
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen
customer_reviews.text: Screen is true to size. Blew up nicely and fan does a good job of keeping it blown up stiff. Fan is a bit loud if used indoors. I cut the cardboard box that it comes with to fit over the top while using it. That kept the sound down pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It was bigger than I though it would be... which is a good thing! The fan is not super loud but is noticeable if you don’t use a good sound system on your movie. Looking forward to using many more times this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️The Real Deal!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: You know what you want? THIS!! Extremely easy to inflate and very quiet - this AWESOME screen is large AND portable. It comes with stakes which work well, keeping it secure in windy areas. My family (and the whole neighborhood) LOVE going to our very own “drive-in”!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen for the price. It’s easy to set up, the fan is relatively quiet, it’s large and packs up in a travel bag very well. I give this a 4 star rating because the clips on the bottom down really line up correctly, seems like it’s probably made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline L. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer outdoor movies!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large screen for backyard. Set up was easy and everyone enjoyed films on screen. Great even when not stuck at home! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: fictiongal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product over the summer for an event this week. When I opened it to use for the first time, there was a huge hole! Very disappointed. I am hoping the company will make right on this error.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Caroline Arnold

customer_reviews.title: We love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This was hands down one of the best splurge purchases We have made in a long time! It’s so easy to set up and take down. It’s gets my kids off their video games and outside for some family time. It has been a lifesaver during covid. I can’t wait to take it camping and watch some football on it this fall!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph and Kristina Reid

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Freaking love this thing watched the Conor McGregor vs. Khabib fight and even tho Conor lost I had like 20 ppl over to watch outside was pretty epic and can’t wait to get back outside and host more sporting party’s.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Dalton Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fun way to have outdoor movie night. I only wish the carry bag was a little bigger but otherwise a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Ralliford

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: We have outdoor movie parties often and we finally took the plunge and bought this! We wish we would have bought it sooner! Easy to use and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Twins Twice

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better bag for storage 😉
customer_reviews.text: Big and easy to put up and take down. I would 5 star it if it had a bigger bag to put it in. It takes a lot of work to get it small enough to fit in the little bag. Why not make it bigger?!
customer_reviews.author: Bentley

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED IT
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe how easy this screen was to set up. It’s so nice and the price is so afforable. This screen is huge! Just so you know. You just lay out the black inflatable, attach the screen with clips (SUPER EASY CLIPS) and plug in. It’s ready to go in 1 minute or less. All my friends ask where we got it and when we tell them how much we paid they are impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Bass

customer_reviews.title: Quick setup but watch the wind
customer_reviews.text: It was quick to setup and it wasn't noisy at all but we had to put it near the house to stop the wind from bending it.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis E. Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Fun to have!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far, We have used this for halloween parties, and movie by the pool side. Motor is a little noisy however you get used to it. You just need to make sure you have a way to tie this down. If a little breeze come by, the screen will start to move or come down.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Big screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters 13th birthday party. Had a outdoor movie night. Able to use down at our land when we go stay for the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: krissy chastain

customer_reviews.title: Not great in windy weather unless secured well
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen. Inflates well and the motor is not too noisy. In windy weather, we’ve had to secure the top to trees to keep it from leaning over.
customer_reviews.author: a must have!!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up less than 10 minutes and very easy to take down. Quality design, the steaks were okay, I did replace with tent steaks. Withstands winds up to around 7-10mph if secured properly. Captures the projection very well and the screen is thick.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Set up was really easy and had a great outdoor movie night. The minor cons are plastic stakes and little wringles on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to put up and so impressive to my customers. As a mobile DJ its supper important that things be portable but easy top set up and this is.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hopkins aka DJ chops

customer_reviews.title: Yard movie?? Why yes please!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Soooo easy to put up snd auper fast take down when it's dark. Definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: jazmin kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and great price
customer_reviews.text: SO EASY to setup and take down!! Detachable screen makes it easy to use with or without the blow up portion! Screen is VERY strong and durable. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brooks Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great Movie Screen
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! We purchased this for our backyard movie nights. The neighborhood kiddos absolutely loved it. Very easy to install. It has a fan but it’s not loud to interfere with the movie. The viewing quality was great. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son in law loves this item.
customer_reviews.text: We had family movie night under the stars, with the movie sound, you can't hear the fan motor, it's not even loud. The picture was great and set up was fast.
customer_reviews.author: GENEVA O.

product_meta.title: EasyGo Products 14' Inflatable Mega Movie Screen - Canvas Projection Screen for Outdoor Parties - Movie Cinema is Guaranteed to Thrill and Excite. Includes Inflation fan, Tie-Downs and Storage bag
product_meta.description:
Size:14 FeetAre you an outdoor movie lover?
Do you love to have fun watching TV and movies with your friends outdoors?
Then make it loud and clear with this amazing new Mega Screen XL inflatable outdoor movie screen with fan. Our 14ft 100% polyester polyester waterproof fabric inflatable movie screen is great for having fun with your friends and family. All you need to set up this outdoor inflatable movie screen for sale, a blower inflator for blowing air into the deflated 600D canvas screen, and VOILA! You are ready to watch your favorite movies outdoors, be it your backyard, poolside, while out on camping, or on a picnic. This blow up giant outdoor movie screen cinema kit is made of durable fabric that lasts and lasts. This backyard blows up outside movie inflatable backyard movie screen guarantees you a fun party experience. Our inflatable projection widescreen portable movie screen can be paired with Moviemate projector open-air cinema gadgets for a mind-blowing experience. This travel-friendly lightweight package for men and women, guys, and ladies, teens and kids, comes with a carry storage bag which makes for an easy tote wherever you go. This great device is suitable for all fun moments including birthdays, wedding anniversaries, baby showers, pool parties, bridal showers, Christmas parties and so on. It is the ideal gift item for your entire family. Hesitate no more. Get this great device and change the way you entertain your friends and family forever.
Add to Cart NOW!
feature_bullets: SCREEN & FRAME: This amazing new WHITE DISPLAY detachable screen and inflation fan work great together. The white display canvas can be removed for easy cleaning & safe storage. The larger than life outdoor movie screen measures 96" wide X 58" ta. It is blown up with air as it inflates when plugged in

TRAVEL-FRIENDLY: Ever dreamed of having big screen that is mobile? This mega deluxe inflatable cinema screen is easy to take from location to location. Great for camping adventures, picnics, and outdoor birthday and wedding parties

MOVIE THEATER: Just set up our mega inflatable movie screen and get in the mood for a great viewing experience. You can have a party alongside watching your favorite blockbuster movies or sports games. Let’s get the party started! Add to cart now!

EASY SET-UP: The mega inflatable movie screen is easy and convenient to set up in 2 minutes or less. Included is a user manual with a step by step guide for fast installation. Also included is the air blower, rope, tent, and inflatable stakes

ATTRACTIVE DESIGN: This mega outdoor movie screen kit includes an inflatable frame, detachable screen, blower, ground stakes, tie-down strings connected to D rings. The tie-downs give stability to the screen to ensure a safe and fun movie
